TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit MachineKey extends System.Object
public ref class MachineKey abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供將資料進行加密或雜湊 (或兩者都進行) 的方法，採用 ASP.NET 表單驗證和檢視狀態所使用的相同演算法和金鑰值。

span.span: Provides a way to encrypt or hash data (or both) by using the same algorithms and key values that are used for ASP.NET forms authentication and view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供 ASP.NET 提供的雜湊及加密邏輯公開 （expose） 的方法。The class provides methods that expose the hashing and encryption logic that ASP.NET provides. 如需哪些加密和雜湊演算法會使用 ASP.NET，並使用它們的索引鍵值，請參閱[machineKey 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)。For information about which encryption and hashing algorithms ASP.NET uses, and the key values that it uses with them, see [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46). > [!WARNING] > Api 應該只用於 ASP.NET 應用程式中。The APIs should only be used in an ASP.NET app. 在 ASP.NET 應用程式內容之外的 MachineKey api 的行為是未定義Behavior of the MachineKey APIs outside the context of an ASP.NET application is undefined

exception.span: 要加密、雜湊、解密或驗證的資料不存在

span.span: The data to encrypt, hash, decrypt, or validate does not exist

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte[] Decode (string encodedData, System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection protectionOption);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] Decode(string encodedData, valuetype System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection protectionOption) cil managed
Public Shared Function Decode (encodedData As String, protectionOption As MachineKeyProtection) As Byte()
public: static cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Decode(System::String ^ encodedData, System::Web::Security::MachineKeyProtection protectionOption);
static member Decode : string * System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection -> byte[]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This method is obsolete and is only provided for compatibility with existing code. It is recommended that new code use the Protect and Unprotect methods instead.")

param.name: encodedData
param.span: 要解密和 (或) 驗證的加密資料。

span.span: The encrypted data to decrypt and/or validate.

param.name: protectionOption
param.span: 指示 encodedData 參數是否應該加密和 (或) 雜湊處理。

span.span: Indicates whether the encodedData parameter should be encrypted and/or hashed.

summary.span: 解碼和 (或) 驗證已加密或隨附雜湊式訊息驗證碼 (HMAC) 的資料。

span.span: Decodes and/or validates data that has been encrypted or provided with a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC).
A array that represents the decrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 用來解密和驗證傳入的資料的加密和雜湊演算法的相關資訊，請參閱[machineKey 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)。For information about which encryption and hashing algorithms ASP.NET uses to decrypt and validate the data that is passed in, see [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46). ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀。For a code example, see the class overview.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string Encode (byte[] data, System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection protectionOption);
.method public static hidebysig string Encode(unsigned int8[] data, valuetype System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection protectionOption) cil managed
Public Shared Function Encode (data As Byte(), protectionOption As MachineKeyProtection) As String
public: static System::String ^ Encode(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ data, System::Web::Security::MachineKeyProtection protectionOption);
static member Encode : byte[] * System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection -> string

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This method is obsolete and is only provided for compatibility with existing code. It is recommended that new code use the Protect and Unprotect methods instead.")

span.span: The data to encrypt.

param.name: protectionOption
param.span: 指示 data 參數是否應該加密和 (或) 雜湊處理。

span.span: Indicates whether the data parameter should be encrypted and/or hashed.

summary.span: 加密資料和 (或) 附加雜湊式訊息驗證碼 (HMAC)。

span.span: Encrypts data and/or appends a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC).

returns.span: 加密值、已附加 HMAC 的輸入值，或已附加 HMAC 之輸入值的加密結果。

span.span: The encrypted value, the input value with an HMAC appended, or the result of encrypting the input value with an HMAC appended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 用來解密和驗證傳入的資料的加密和雜湊演算法的相關資訊，請參閱[machineKey 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)。For information about which encryption and hashing algorithms ASP.NET uses to decrypt and validate the data that is passed in, see [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46). ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀。For a code example, see the class overview.

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte[] Protect (byte[] userData, params string[] purposes);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] Protect(unsigned int8[] userData, string[] purposes) cil managed
Public Shared Function Protect (userData As Byte(), ParamArray purposes As String()) As Byte()
public: static cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Protect(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ userData, ... cli::array <System::String ^> ^ purposes);
static member Protect : byte[] * string[] -> byte[]

param.name: userData

span.span: The data to protect.

param.span: 這項資料會以純文字傳遞。

span.span: This data is passed as plaintext.

param.name: purposes

span.span: A list of purposes for the data.

param.span: 如果指定這個值，則必須將相同的清單傳遞至方法，以解密傳回的密碼文字。

span.span: If this value is specified, the same list must be passed to the method in order to decipher the returned ciphertext.

summary.span: 藉由加密或簽署的方式保護資料。

span.span: Protects the specified data by encrypting or signing it.
The ciphertext data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會取代方法，而這需要呼叫端指定是否應該加密模純文字資料，簽署，或兩者。This method supersedes the method, which requires the caller to specify whether the plaintext data should be encrypted, signed, or both. 方法會執行適當作業，並安全地保護資料。The method performs the appropriate operation and securely protects the data. 這個方法所產生的密碼文字資料可能僅被解密由方法。Ciphertext data produced by this method can only be deciphered by the method. `purposes`參數是選擇性的清單可以鎖定特定用途的加密文字的原因。The `purposes` parameter is an optional list of reasons that can lock the ciphertext to a specific purpose. 此參數可讓您找出應用程式內的不同子系統所執行的密碼編譯作業。This parameter lets you isolate cryptographic operations performed by different subsystems within an application. 惡意用戶端應該不能取得結果的一個子系統方法，並為它輸入到另一個子系統的摘要方法，它可能會危及應用程式的安全性。A malicious client should not be able to get the result of one subsystem's method and feed it as input to another subsystem's method, which could compromise application security. `purposes`參數可協助確保受保護的資料只可使用原始產生它的元件。The `purposes` parameter helps ensure that protected data can only be used by the component that originally generated it. 應用程式應該要確定每個子系統會使用唯一`purposes`清單。Applications should make sure that each subsystem uses a unique `purposes` list. 比方說，若要保護或解除保護驗證權杖，您可以呼叫，方法是使用程式碼，如下列範例所示：For example, to protect or unprotect an authentication token, you could call the method using code like the following example: ```csharp MachineKey.Protect(..., "Authentication token"); MachineKey.Unprotect(..., "Authentication token"); ``` ```vb MachineKey.Protect(..., "Authentication token") MachineKey.Unprotect(..., "Authentication token") ``` 應用程式可以動態地產生`purposes`參數。Applications can dynamically generate the `purposes` parameter. 在此情況下，使用者所提供的值，以固定值的前置字元 (例如"`Username:` "+*使用者名稱*) 製作符合系統的某個其他部分會使用權杖輸入惡意用戶端的風險降至最低。In that case, prefix user-supplied values with a fixed value (like "`Username:` " + *username*) to minimize the risk of a malicious client crafting input that matches a token that is used by some other part of the system. 固定字串之後，應該會動態產生的任何字串。Any dynamically-generated strings should come after fixed strings. 比方說，若要保護或解除保護會繫結至特定使用者的私用訊息，使用程式碼，如下列範例所示：For example, to protect or unprotect a private message that is tied to a specific user, use code like the following example: ```csharp MachineKey.Protect(..., "Private message", "Recipient: " + username); MachineKey.Unprotect(..., "Private message", "Recipient: " + username); ``` ```vb MachineKey.Protect(..., "Private message", "Recipient: " + username) MachineKey.Unprotect(..., "Private message", "Recipient: " + username) ``` 當呼叫方法時，所提供的值`purposes`參數必須是相同的值提供給方法。When the method is called, the value that is provided for the `purposes` parameter must be the same value that was provided to the method. 否則作業將失敗，例外狀況。Otherwise the operation will fail with a exception. 所需的組態設定選項所需的這個方法，即使屬性未設定為選項。The configuration settings that are required for the option are required for this method even if the property is not set to the option.

span.span: The parameter is null.

exception.span: 目的陣列包含一或多個只包含空白字元的項目。

span.span: The purposes array contains one or more white-space-only entries.

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte[] Unprotect (byte[] protectedData, params string[] purposes);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] Unprotect(unsigned int8[] protectedData, string[] purposes) cil managed
Public Shared Function Unprotect (protectedData As Byte(), ParamArray purposes As String()) As Byte()
public: static cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Unprotect(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ protectedData, ... cli::array <System::String ^> ^ purposes);
static member Unprotect : byte[] * string[] -> byte[]

param.name: protectedData
param.span: 要解除保護的密碼文字資料。

span.span: The ciphertext data to unprotect.

param.name: purposes
param.span: 用途清單，會描述資料代表什麼意思。

span.span: A list of purposes that describe what the data is meant for.

param.span: 這必須是資料受到保護時傳遞至 方法的同一個值。

span.span: This must be the same value that was passed to the method when the data was protected.

summary.span: 取消保護指定的資料，此資料受 方法保護。

span.span: Unprotects the specified data, which was protected by the method.
The plaintext data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的相關資訊，請參閱方法。For information about this method, see the method.

span.span: The parameter is null.

exception.span: 目的陣列包含一或多個只包含空白字元的項目。

span.span: The purposes array contains one or more white-space-only entries.

exception.span: 可能的原因如下︰- 受保護的資料已遭竄改。

span.span: Possible causes include the following: - The protected data was tampered with.

exception.span: - 參數的值與在資料受保護時所指定的值不相同。

span.span: - The value of the parameter is not the same as the value that was specified when the data was protected.

exception.span: - 應用程式已部署到多部伺服器，並且正在使用自動產生的加密金鑰。

span.span: - The application is deployed to more than one server and is using auto-generated encryption keys.
